sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, Form, Input, Button, Table, Menu, Icon, Avatar, Divider, DatePicker, Tooltip } from "antd"; import moment from 'moment' import 'moment/locale/zh-cn' import ManagerAvartar from '../PIC/u299.svg' moment.locale('zh-cn') const {RangePicker} = DatePicker class ManagerPage extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.columns = [ { title: '房间', dataIndex: 'room', }, { title: '使用次数', dataIndex: 'useT', },{ title: "常用温度", dataIndex: 'oftenT', },{ title: '常用风速', dataIndex: 'ofenW', },{ title: '达到目标', dataIndex: 'hit', },{ title: '被调度', dataIndex: 'schedule', },{ title: '详单记录数', dataIndex: 'recode', },{ title: '总费用', dataIndex: 'money', }, ] this.state={ name:"老板1号", startTime:new Date(), time:new Date(), page:1, elec:0, money:0, data:[{ key:"1", room:101, userT:0, oftenT:10, oftenW:10, hit:"制冷", schedule:25, record:"中风", money:20 }] } setInterval(function(){ this.setState({ time:new Date() }) }.bind(this), 1000) } onTableClick = (e) =>{ this.setState({ page:e.key }) } onDateChange = (dates, dateStrings) =>{ console.log("from", dates[0], ", to", dates[1]) console.log("From", dateStrings[0], ", to", dateStrings[1]) } render(){ const {startTime, time, name, page, elec, money} = this.state if(page == 1){ return(
温控计费系统 经理端
概览信息 详细查询 使用说明 捐赠支持 联系运营 退出登录
经理-{name}
登录时间: {startTime.toLocaleTimeString()} 现在时间: {time.toLocaleTimeString()}
今日电量:

{elec}

总费用:

{money}

今日数据
空调使用次数:

详单记录数:

)} else{ return(
温控计费系统 经理端
概览信息 详细查询 使用说明 捐赠支持 联系运营 退出登录
) } } } export default ManagerPage;
